mapper.select: select bbl.name name, lng.lang lng_lang, lng.korean lng_korean, lng.original lng_original, bbl.parsed parsed from t_bible bbl left outer join sys_lang lng on bbl.lang = lng.lang

select distinct bk.pos pos, bk.short_name short_name, bk.full_name full_name, bk.suffix suffix, bk.chapter_num chapter_num, bk.new_test new_test from sys_book bk left outer join t_verse ver on bk.short_name = ver.book where ver.bible = #{bible}

select ver.chapter chapter, bbl.name bbl_name, lng.lang bbl_lng_lang, lng.korean bbl_lng_korean, lng.original bbl_lng_original, bbl.parsed bbl_parsed, bk.pos bk_pos, bk.short_name bk_short_name, bk.full_name bk_full_name, bk.suffix bk_suffix, bk.chapter_num bk_chapter_num, bk.new_test bk_new_test, ver.verse ver_verse, ver.contents ver_contents from t_verse ver left outer join t_bible bbl on ver.bible = bbl.name left outer join sys_lang lng on bbl.lang = lng.lang left outer join sys_book bk on ver.book = bk.short_name where ver.bible = #{chapter.bible} and ver.book = #{chapter.book} and ver.chapter = ${chapter.chapter}
mapper.insert: insert into t_bible(name, lang, parsed) select sub.* from select #{bbl.name} as name, #{bbl.language.language} as lang, ${bbl.parsed} sub;

insert into t_verse(bible, book, chapter, verse, contents) select sub.* from select #{bible.name} as bible, #{ver.book} as book, #{ver.chapter} as chapter, #{ver.verse} as verse, #{ver.contents} as contents sub;
